results.title: Modulation of Plasma Lipidomic Profiles in Metastatic Castration-Resistant Prostate Cancer by Simvastatin
results.text_hl: Twenty-seven @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms_Castration_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064129 @@@mCRPC@@@ were given @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ together with their standard treatment for 12 weeks.

results.title: Combination therapy with novel androgen receptor antagonists and statin for castration-resistant prostate cancer.
results.text_hl: In this study, we investigated a combination therapy of novel AR antagonists and statin, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, for @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms_Castration_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064129 @@@CRPC@@@.

citations.NLM: Nakayama H, Sekine Y, Oka D, Miyazawa Y, Arai S, Koike H, Matsui H, Shibata Y, Suzuki K. Combination therapy with novel androgen receptor antagonists and statin for castration-resistant prostate cancer. Prostate. 2022 Feb;82(3):314-322. PMID: 34843630

results.title: Synergistic antitumor interaction of valproic acid and simvastatin sensitizes prostate cancer to docetaxel by targeting CSCs compartment via YAP inhibition
results.text_hl: Herein we report the synergistic antitumor interaction between two well-known drugs used for years in clinical practice, the antiepileptic agent with histone deacetylase inhibitory activity @CHEMICAL_Valproic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014635 @@@valproic acid@@@ and the @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ lowering agent @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, in @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms_Castration_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064129 @@@mCRPC@@@ models.

citations.NLM: Iannelli F, Roca MS, Lombardi R, Ciardiello C, Grumetti L, De Rienzo S, Moccia T, Vitagliano C, Sorice A, Costantini S, Milone MR, Pucci B, Leone A, Di Gennaro E, Mancini R, Ciliberto G, Bruzzese F, Budillon A. Synergistic antitumor interaction of valproic acid and simvastatin sensitizes prostate cancer to docetaxel by targeting CSCs compartment via YAP inhibition J Exp Clin Cancer Res. 2020 Oct 8;39(1):213. PMID: 33032653

results.title: MYBL2 disrupts the Hippo-YAP pathway and confers castration resistance and metastatic potential in prostate cancer
results.text_hl: Importantly, targeting @GENE_MYBL2 @GENE_4605 @@@MYBL2@@@, or treatment with either the @GENE_YAP1 @GENE_10413 @@@YAP@@@/@GENE_TAZ @GENE_6901 @@@TAZ@@@ inhibitor @CHEMICAL_Verteporfin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077362 @@@Verteporfin@@@ or the @GENE_RHOA @GENE_387 @@@RhoA@@@ inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@, reversed the resistance to @DISEASE_Virilism @DISEASE_MESH:D014770 @@@ADT@@@ and blocked @DISEASE_Neoplasm_Metastasis @DISEASE_MESH:D009362 @@@bone metastasis@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms_Castration_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064129 @@@CRPC@@@ cells.

results.title: Concurrent treatment with simvastatin and NF-kappaB inhibitor in human castration-resistant prostate cancer cells exerts synergistic anti-cancer effects via control of the NF-kappaB/LIN28/let-7 miRNA signaling pathway
results.text_hl: More importantly, the downregulated let-7 miRNA family expression in @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms_Castration_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064129 @@@CRPC@@@ cells increased after treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (Fig 2B-c).

results.title: Effect of simvastatin on castration-resistant prostate cancer cells
results.text_hl: It would be worthwhile to investigate the inhibition of multiple @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ regulatory pathways including @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ influx and synthesis using combination treatment of @GENE_SCARB1 @GENE_949 @@@SR-BI@@@ silencing and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ to assess the effect of a combination treatment in @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms_Castration_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064129 @@@CRPC@@@ models.

results.title: Simvastatin delays castration-resistant prostate cancer metastasis and androgen receptor antagonist resistance by regulating the expression of caveolin-1
results.text_hl: Finally, to explore whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ exerts antitumor effects on @<m>DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms_Castration_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064129 @@@CRPC@@@, cell viability was evaluated by a CCK-8 assay in cells treated with various concentrations of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.
